The Bingo category accounted for the smallest share of gaming win that year .

This statistic shows the results of a 2013 survey among Americans on how much attention they pay when shopping for food . During the survey , 42 percent of the respondents stated that they pay very close attention to food labels when grocery shopping .
As of 2021 , the most important export partner for the Czech Republic was Germany , with a share of 9.31 percent in exports . In second place was France , at 6.68 percent .

This statistic shows the results of a survey conducted in France in 2015 about people 's attitude towards the use of plastic bags . It appears that 52 percent of respondents would prefer to see plastic bags being banned .
The statistic shows the projected population of Barbados from 2018 to 2035 * . In 2018 , the total population of Barbados was at approximately 303 thousand inhabitants .

As of February 2022 , the majority ( 53 percent ) of respondents in Poland believed that the COVID-19 vaccine would be safe and effective . At the same time , 41 percent of respondents did not intend to vaccinate against COVID-19 .

As of March 17 , 2022 , the COVID-19 outbreak had resulted in 21.5 million cases and 4.7 million fatalities worldwide . The outbreak is projected to peak at 25.9 million cases and 10.4 million deaths . This statistic shows the number of cases per 100,000 population for COVID-19 in each week .

This statistic shows the share of deaths among 25-64 years old caused by cardiovascular diseases in Italy from 2006 to 2017 . It can be found that the share of such deaths decreased over the observed period of time , passing from 24.2 percent in 2006 to 17.9 percent in 2017 .

This statistic presents the percentage of French people who have changed their consumption habits in the last six months in 2016 , according to the type of product . It reveals that the share of respondents who reduced the frequency of their consumption of meat , dairy or eggs was 55 percent .

This statistic shows the share of people living in the metropolitan area of Madrid who believe that they have to leave their country because of the economic situation . In the 2018 survey 10 percent of the respondents stated that they have to leave Spain because of the country 's current economic situation .
The annual production value of the manufacture of sports goods in South Korea increased by 1.2 billion South Korean won in 2017 .

This statistic displays the distribution of online shopping in the United Kingdom according to consumers in 2014 . In 2014 , it was reported that 20 percent of UK consumers shopped online once or twice a week .

This statistic displays the share of individuals who are registered with a GP ( family doctor ) in England in 2016/2017 , by age . In this year , 91.4 percent of individuals over 16 years of age were registered with a GP .

The statistic shows the average flyer 's age in the United States as of October 2021 , by department . During the survey , 34 percent of respondents said that the average age of their department was 40 years old .

The statistic shows the sales value of the beer market in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2009 and 2020 . In 2020 , the beer market had a sales value of approximately 9.7 billion euros in the EU-28 .

This statistic displays the number of deaths per year in the UK due to asthma in 2019 , by gender . There were approximately 550 males who died of asthma in the UK , compared with 370 females in the UK .

This statistic presents the capital expenditure ( CAPEX ) on digital publishing in the United Kingdom from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , digital publishing CAPEX amounted to about 204.4 million British pounds .

As of 2019 , the average monthly salary of employees in the health and social work sector in Russia was around 50,539 Russian rubles . In the agriculture sector , the average salary was 16,232 Russian rubles per month .

In 2021 , the average price of one euro coin in the Eurozone amounted to 10.8 cents . This value represents a decrease of 0.03 cents in one year . Euro coins are minted in all Eurozone member states . The national side of the coin represents one of the country 's national emblems . The common side of the Euro coins , however , has a common design .

This statistic displays the results of a consumer survey on the importance of the cost of the holidays in Great Britain in 2013 . 63 percent of the respondents rated holidays that cost less than 100 pounds per night as very important .

This statistic shows the number of people employed in the manufacturing industry of glass and glass products in Canada from 2006 to 2020 . In 2020 , around 5,563 people worked in the glass and glass product manufacturing industry in Canada .

This statistic displays the share of respondents that would be willing to pay more for a medical appointment that was booked via the internet in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015 . Of respondents , 28 percent would be willing to pay 15 percent more for a medical appointment that was booked via the internet .

This statistic displays the number of privately held and publicly traded companies in the apparel and footwear manufacturing industry in the United States from the first quarter of 2011 to the second quarter of 2019 . During the most recent quarter , there were a total of 130 publicly traded companies and 4,327 privately held companies in the apparel and footwear manufacturing industry in the United States .

This statistic shows how often consumers in the United States purchase snacks online as of February 2014 . During the survey , 37 percent of the respondents said they purchased snacks online on a weekly basis .

This statistic shows the percentage of working women in the United States who have taken time off from their job in the past 12 months as of August 2019 , by industry . According to the source , the majority of women in all industries have taken a break from their job at some point in their career , with those in the arts , entertainment & recreation industry the most likely to do so , with 93.2 percent doing so .
This statistic shows the annual production volume of plastics in China between 2000 and 2020 . In 2020 , approximately 3.4 million metric tons of plastics were produced in China .

In 2019 and 2019 , the share of U.S. consumers who engaged with social media to support brands and products they use or purchase increased from 53 to 58 percent compared to a survey conducted in 2018 . The majority of respondents who engage with social media do so to show their support for brands or products , while a smaller share engages to learn about product updates or promotions .

This statistic displays the number of visits from Belgium to the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2018 , by gender . The number of female visitors increased from 121 thousand in March to 555 thousand in December 2018 . The number of male visitors peaked at 1.4 million in August 2018 .
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Tajikistan from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the infant mortality rate in Tajikistan was at about 21.5 deaths per 1,000 live births .
This statistic shows the average price of flights from the United Kingdom to the United States in 2014 , by airline . Air Canada had the highest average flight price , at 511 British pounds .

This graph shows the share of mobile gamers in the United States in 2011 . According to a Harris Poll survey from January 2011 , 31 percent of the surveyed gamers in the United States said they played games on a cellular phone .

This statistic shows the number of cases of measles reported in South Africa from 2010 to 2017 . The measles outbreaks in South Africa have been on the rise in recent years and in 2017 , there were 10,329 reported cases .

This statistic illustrates the total volume of sales of cloud gaming platforms ( including game streaming and download-to-play ) in France from 2012 to 2018 . It appears that the sales of these types of games increased overall in this period , reaching 26.3 million euros in 2018 . The sales volume peaked at 27.4 million euros in 2015 .

This statistic shows the number of people employed by the publishing activities sector in the United Kingdom from 2010 to 2020 . In 2020 there were around 101,400 people employed by the publishing activities sector in the UK , down from 111,000 the previous year .

As of 2020 , more than half of respondents in Sweden had been subject to some kind of discrimination or exclusion due to their health conditions . This was especially true for those with disabilities , who reported that they had been discriminated against due to their disability or illness 72 percent of the time .

This statistic presents the share of adults in the United States who had a website dedicated to their hobbies or passions and were willing to sell items related to those hobbies or passions in the United States as of July 2018 , sorted by generation . Some 27 percent of Millennials in the survey had a website dedicated to their hobbies or passions .

This statistic shows the share of individuals who have taken a vacation in the past 12 months in Belgium from 2014 to 2018 . Vacations are often a way to take a break from work and daily routines , but in recent years the share of individuals going on vacation has decreased in Belgium . In 2018 , 61 percent of individuals in Belgium took a vacation in the past 12 months .

The statistic depicts the average monthly revenue of the mobile gaming market in Finland from 2011 to 2017 . The average revenue amounted to 352,000 euros in 2017 , down from approximately 430 thousand euros the previous year .

This statistic presents the distribution of the number of people who are currently in prison in Canada as of March 31 , 2022 , by type of institution . During the reported period , 6,484 federal offenders were serving sentences in federal institutions while there were 12,499 people serving sentences in provincial correctional institutions , and 5,638 people serving sentences in Territorial correctional facilities .
This statistic shows the number employed in the manufacturing industry of electrical equipment in Austria between 2008 and 2016 . In 2015 , there were around 14,400 people employed in this sector .

This statistic displays the number of deaths due to respiratory disease in England annually from 1993 to 2019 . During this time the number of deaths due to respiratory disease increased from 43,598 to 132,394 .

As of the 1st quarter of 2021 , 16 percent of the respondents in the United Kingdom stated that they have solar panels or heat pumps installed at their house . This was the second-lowest percentage of any country surveyed .
This statistic shows the distribution of sun protection products used by consumers in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014 . Of those surveyed , nearly half used sun cream .

As of 2019 , the number of deliveries of live babies in England and Wales reached a total of 129,047 . This was an increase of over 4 percent in comparison to the preceding year . In 2019 , 99 percent of births were delivered by caesarean section , up one percent from the previous year .

This statistic displays the share of individuals who participated in sport and physical activity in Scotland in 2017/18 , by gender . In this year , 34.5 percent of men participated in rugby union . In comparison , 17.4 percent of women did so .

This statistic shows the results of a survey among U.S. adults regarding the challenges of using apps for voting , by age group . As of 2015 , 50 percent of respondents aged 18 to 29 had difficulty with the voting app because it was not intuitive .

As of May 2020 , around 55 percent of U.S. consumers aged 65 years and older reported that they are spending less on groceries during the COVID-19 pandemic . A similar proportion of respondents in this group also stated they are eating at home more often due to the pandemic , and 48 percent of them said that they are eating out less frequently .

The number of persons employed in health care in the Netherlands increased from 447 thousand in 2008 to nearly 515 thousand in 2020 . Over the same time period , the total number of employees in the Dutch economy decreased by 1.1 million .

This statistic shows the frequency of respondents using social media to check on friends and family in Great Britain in 2015 . Of respondents , 36 percent of respondents checked social media several times a day .

In 2020 , around 2.7 million cars were registered in the United Kingdom . The peak of car registration in the United Kingdom was reached in 2016 , with approximately 2.9 million new vehicles being registered that year .

This statistic presents the most important travel destinations of Polish tourists from 2013 to 2017 . In 2017 , the most popular holiday destination in Poland was the United Kingdom , with over 3.6 million trips made by Poles to the UK .

In 2015 , the majority of respondents were not very worried about losing their jobs due to the robot revolution . Only 28 percent of respondents in South Korea reported that they felt worried about losing their jobs because of robots .

As of 2019 , the gross value added ( GVA ) of the textile and clothing manufacturing industry in Germany had amounted to 21.9 billion euros . The GVA has steadily increased since 2012 with a growth of 44 billion euros .

This statistic shows the annual production value of the water transport sector in Romania from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , the water transport production value came to approximately 334.6 million euros .

In 2020 , the number of tourists visiting Spain from the United Kingdom ( UK ) amounted to over 3.53 million , an 11.2 percent increase since 2019 . Spain is a popular tourist destination for UK holidaymakers , with London being the most popular city in the United Kingdom .

This statistic displays the probability of a breakdown or a failure of a climate-related measure within the European Union ( EU 27 ) in 2030 . In 2014 , a survey among European Union citizens revealed that 25 percent of the respondents thought that a climate-related measure would breakdown within the next 15 to 20 years , whereas 20 percent of respondents expected a climate-related breakdown or failure within the next 20 years .

This statistic shows the results of a survey on the share of respondents who think the coronavirus ( CoViD-19 ) will have a negative impact on the German economy , conducted between April 6 and 8 , 2020 . The majority of the respondents expected the coronavirus to have a negative impact on the German economy .

As of 2019 , more than 30 percent of U.S. Hispanic adults aged 50 to 64 years reported they had difficulty understanding and following written instructions . This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. Hispanic adults aged 50 to 64 years who reported difficulty following written instructions as of 2019 , by age .

This statistic presents the number of jobs in travel & tourism in Norway from 2013 to 2016 , by sector . In 2016 , there were a total of 214,490 jobs in the sector of accommodation , catering and equipment rental and leisure , entertainment & health in Norway , creating a total of 165,690 jobs in the tourism sector . The number of jobs in Norway 's tourism sector was forecast to reach 245,900 jobs by 2025 .

The statistic shows the top ten most common occupations of the population in Iceland in 2017 . In that year , 20,089 people were employed in the agriculture , forestry and fishing sector , making it the most common occupation in the country .

This statistic shows the share of consumers who would be willing to pay more for products if they were produced sustainably in selected countries worldwide as of June 2015 . It was found that 80 percent of the consumers in the United States were willing to pay more if the product they purchased was produced sustainably .
This statistic shows the number of people employed in the publishing activities sector in the Netherlands from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , the publishing activities sector employed 21,246 people .

This statistic displays the export volume of potatoes and sweet potatoes in France from 2009 to 2019 . The export volume of potatoes in France has increased over the provided time interval to a total of 41,100 metric tons in 2019 .

As of 2015 , more than 63 percent of U.S. internet users between the ages of 18 and 29 had used a social network to share content related to a political issue or cause . This statistic shows the distribution of internet users in the United States who have shared content related to a political issue or cause on a social network as of March 2015 , by gender .

The graph illustrates the distribution of the number of Twitter followers of the most popular Twitter accounts in Spain as of July 2013 . According to the data , @mariavictoriaperotti ranked first with 1.5 million followers .

This statistic shows the percentage of people in Russia who have played a video game on the internet as of January 2019 , by age group . During the survey period , it was found that 41 percent of respondents between the ages of 16 to 24 years old said they played video games online .

This statistic displays the number of people who used a sunbed within the last 12 months in England from 2000 to 2017 . The number of people using sunbeds decreased by approximately 100,000 between 2000 and 2017 . In 2017 , 600,000 people used a sunbed in the past 12 months .

The statistic illustrates the number of people who have died due to measles in the European Union ( EU ) and the European Economic Area ( EEA ) from 2000 to 2019 . In 2019 , a total of 11 people died from measles in the EU and the EEA .

This statistic displays the results of a 2016 survey of people living in Ireland on whether their family or friends had a mobile phone , tablet , PC , laptop or iPad , how old these were when they got them and if they were still in use . 43 percent of people stated that their families or friend had a tablet and it was not in use . This survey was conducted by Millward Brown .

This statistic shows the share of adults who had been in foster care in the U.S. in 2018 , by gender and age . In 2018 , about 3.3 percent of the female respondents in the United States had been in foster care at one time , compared to about 2.8 percent of the male respondents .

This statistic presents the results of a survey , asking British adults whether they thought the United Kingdom should remain a member of the European Union , or whether it should leave . In March 2016 , 42 percent of respondents said they thought the UK should leave the EU .

This statistic shows the distribution of the number of visits from France to the UK between 2010 and 2018 , by mode of transport used . Over half the visits in this period were made by air . This statistic presents the share of respondents in the United States who believe the government has the right to read their emails and monitor their online communications as of April 2013 . During the survey period , 29 percent of the respondents said that they believe the government has this right .

In 2020 , 46 percent of the total revenue from digital content was generated by content targeting the 18 to 34 years old audience . In the same year , content targeting the 50 to 64 years old audience accounted for 17 percent of the total revenue .

The statistic presents data on Facebook 's advertising spending in the United Kingdom in 2012 to 2014 . Facebook 's advertising spending amounted to 34.5 million U.S. dollars in 2014 , compared with 12.6 million dollars in 2012 .

The majority of respondents to a survey in Poland expected a positive impact of the coronavirus outbreak ( COVID-19 ) . The most optimistic were people from the Podlaskie Voivodeship , where 55 percent of respondents believed that the coronavirus outbreak will have a positive impact on the Polish economy .

The statistic shows the number of deaths from leukemia in the US from 1999-2017 . According to data , the number of deaths caused by leukemia decreased in 1999 to 51,512 , and has increased ever since . The total number of leukemia deaths amounted to 62,973 in 2017 .

This statistic illustrates the distribution of the population in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2020 , by religious affiliation . 71 percent of British people were Christian , and 26 percent were not religious .

This graph shows the share of individuals with a disability in the United Kingdom ( UK ) that have participated in sport or exercise in the past year from 2010 to 2019 . The share of individuals with a disability that participated in sport or exercise in the past year increased from 2010 to 2019 .

This statistic presents the reasons why respondents did not apply for COVID-19 vaccination in England as of April 2020 . During the survey , 31 percent of respondents reported they did not apply for vaccination because their GP practice had not made the vaccination available to them yet .

During the period from January to June 2020 , there were approximately 12,000 people aged 65 years and older living in Sweden who were diagnosed with COVID-19 during the pandemic . This was the highest age group among all the groups affected by COVID-19 in Sweden , where the number of cases was highest among people aged 30 to 64 years , at approximately 532,000 . The lowest number of cases among the age groups were among children aged 0 to 14 years , with approximately 52,000 cases .

This statistic displays the results of a survey on the share of consumers who consider the impact of their online shopping choices/behavior on the environment as an important factor when shopping online in Canada as of September 2014 . The share of fresh or chilled products amounted to 30 percent during the period .

This statistic presents the most popular activities for a weekend break in Great Britain in 2014 . In 2014 , the majority of respondents aged 16 to 24 years stated that they went shopping on a weekend break .

This statistic displays a survey on the share of individuals who would be willing to pay more for sustainable food in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013 , by gender . In 2021 , there were 331 thousand new digital subscriptions in the Netherlands . This is a significant increase compared to the previous year . This statistic shows the results of a survey on the share of individuals who would consider voting for the party that would introduce a general opt-out system for organ donation in Switzerland in 2021 . 18 percent of the surveyed stated that they would definitely consider voting for a party proposing such a system .

This statistic presents the average price paid per 10 kilogram of fresh onions in France from January 2015 to March 2017 . According to the source , the average price for 10 kg of fresh onions was 1.6 euros in March 2017 , a significant increase compared to the previous year .

This statistic shows the value of pineapple and mango fruit exports from the United Kingdom ( UK ) annually from 2001 to 2019 . Exports of pineapple and mango fruits were valued at 2.4 million British pounds in 2019 .

This statistic shows the net income after tax of the holding company Restaurant Group plc in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2012 to 2018 . After declining for two years , net income after tax increased from 16.2 million British pounds in 2017 to 24.5 million British pounds in 2018 .

This statistic depicts the average number of hours per week spent watching TV/DVD in households in the United States between 1987 and 2021 . In 2021 , the average number of hours per week spent watching TV or DVD amounted to 3.5 in American households .

In the United States , there were over one million international students enrolled in colleges and universities in the 2018/19 academic year .

This survey displays the share of adult Americans who believe that genetically modified foods are safe to eat in the United States as of 2014 . In the given year , around 26 percent of respondents said that they think it is safe to eat foods that have been genetically modified .

This statistic shows the share of U.S. adults that believe that it is important for them to get the flu shot each year , by region , as of 2019 . In the South , 62 percent of respondents reported that it was important for everyone to get a flu shot every year .

This statistic displays the results of a survey about the most important attributes to British consumers when buying a car in 2014 . The survey was conducted in 2014 and found that the most important attribute was a good price .

In 2020 , the gross output value of the textile mills and apparel manufacturing industry in Belgium amounted to approximately 4.7 billion U.S. dollars . This value is expected to increase over the next decade .

This statistic displays the effectiveness of the government regulations for CDOs ( Chief Digital Officer ) in France according to professionals in 2015 . According to the source , 36 percent of respondents from the financial sector said that the regulations are not effective at all to help them in their professional activity .

In 2020 , the median age in the Arab world stood at 28.1 years . The median age in the Middle East and North Africa ( MENA ) region was 27.8 years , while the median age in Sub-Saharan Africa was 18.9 years .

This statistic presents the number of Canadian women who were victims of physical and/or sexual violence in their lifetimes , as of 2020 , broken down by age and region . The majority of Canadian women ( 73.9 percent ) reported they had been physically or sexually abused at least once in their lifetimes . The highest rate of abuse occurred in women aged 25-44 years , at 85.7 percent .

The statistic depicts the projected number of U.S. adults with type 2 diabetes by 2050 , based on current trends . It is estimated that in 2050 there will be 30.3 million adults living with type 2 diabetes in the United States .
This statistic displays the annual turnover of the air transport sector in Slovenia from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , the air transport sector produced a turnover of approximately 48.7 million euros .
This statistic shows the number of sun hours in Italy in 2021 , by region . In 2021 , the sunshine hours in the region of Sicily amounted to approximately 181,700 hours .
In September 2021 , the number of people who used WhatsApp for the very last time amounted to over 1.4 billion worldwide .

This statistic displays the distribution of the number of people killed and injured due to road traffic accidents in England in 2019/20 by region . In this year , the highest number of deaths and injuries were recorded in the West Midlands with 6,236 deaths and injuries recorded , followed the South East with 5,484 deaths and injuries recorded .
This statistic shows the deaths due to injuries in Italy in 2019 , by cause . In 2019 , there were 2,128 deaths caused by falls from a height .

As of April 2020 , the most common symptom of COVID-19 infection was a cough , with 72 percent of respondents reporting that they had this symptom . Other common symptoms reported by people who had COVID-19 included headache , fever , and fatigue .

The statistic shows the ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Indonesia from 2016 to 2019 , with projections up until 2026 . In 2019 , total government expenditure in Indonesia amounted to approximately 23.29 percent of the country 's gross domestic product .

This statistic displays direct employment in the mining of crude oil and natural gas in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2013 . In 2013 , the direct employment in this sector amounted to approximately 14,344 people .

The statistic shows the distribution of adult internet users in Russia in 2018 , by education level . In 2018 , roughly 59.2 percent of Russian internet users had elementary school or lower level of education .
The statistic shows the unemployment rate in Mali from 1999 to 2020 . In 2020 , the unemployment rate in Mali was at approximately 2.45 percent .

This forecast statistic shows the projected direct travel spending by visitors from the United States on trips to Portugal between 2016 and 2020 , by accommodation type . Spending on trips to Portugal are expected to amount to approximately 1.22 billion U.S. dollars on trips of all accommodation types in 2020 .

This 2021 survey shows the share of adult internet users who have shared a personal photo , video , or status update about themselves on the internet in the United States . In 2021 , it was estimated that 84 percent of internet users have shared a personal photo , video , or status update .

In the first quarter 2020 , the gross profit of the Italian fashion brand Diesel was 126.8 million euros , a decrease of 38.3 percent compared to the same period the previous year . In the same period , the total revenues of the brand reached a value of around 703.3 million euros , down by 28 percent .

This statistic shows the number of Google search requests per month for each country worldwide in January 2021 . In that period , Google had the highest search volume for the keyword `` World Cup '' with more than 152.8 billion searches . The U.S. was the second most popular country for search requests with 75.9 billion searches .

In 2015 , private enrolment in primary education for Myanmar was 21 % . Though Myanmar private enrolment in primary education fluctuated substantially in recent years , it tended to increase through 1993 - 2015 period ending at 21 % in 2015 .

This statistic shows the crude death rate in the United States from 1950 to 2019 by gender . In 2019 , the crude death rate of males in the U.S. was 386.3 per 100,000 persons . In contrast , the crude death rate among females was 467.2 per 100,000 persons .

This statistic shows the average age of a child in an orphanage in Russia in 2019 , by region . In 2019 , the average age of a child in an orphanage in the North Caucasus Federal District was eight years , compared to 12 years in the Far Eastern Federal District .

In 2020 , real household consumption for Angola was 23,121 million LCU . Real household consumption of Angola increased from 384 million LCU in 1971 to 23,121 million LCU in 2020 growing at an average annual rate of 6.76 % .

According to the survey , the majority of respondents in Russia , both women and men , would not like to have children in the country in the current situation . The share of men in the age group of 18 to 24 years , who would not like to have children in Russia , stood at 58 percent , whereas 61 percent of respondents in the age group of 56 years and older said the same .

The statistic illustrates the distribution of the gross domestic product ( GDP ) across economic sectors in the Netherlands from 2010 to 2020 . In 2020 , the share of the gross domestic product in the Netherlands amounted to 11.4 percent from the construction sector , 16.3 percent from the agricultural sector , and 18.9 percent from the manufacturing sector . The largest sector , however , was the service sector with a share of 62.4 percent of the total gross domestic product .
This graph depicts the average daily reach of the leading social networks worldwide in 2018 . In 2018 , Instagram had an average of 400 million average daily reach .

This statistic shows the percentage of adults aged 18 years and older who had used a prescription drug without a prescription in the past year in the United States as of 2018 , by gender . In that year , approximately 5.5 percent of women in the country had used a prescription drug without a prescription .

This forecast statistic shows the total value of shipments of employer `s associations in the United States from 2008 to 2012 , with forecasts for 2016 and 2020 . Total shipment value of employer `s associations in the United States reached approximately 3.13 billion U.S. dollars in 2012 .

This statistic displays the average per capita expenditure on personal care in Lithuania between 2009 and 2012 . According to the source the average expenditure on personal care amounted to 28 euros per person in Lithuania in 2012 . Personal care includes items such as hair care , skin care , dental care and oral hygiene .

This statistic depicts the average electricity consumption of households in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of 2017 , distinguished by region . It was found that households in London consumed an average of 3,419 kilowatt hours per year , while households in the North of England consumed an average of approximately 3,351 kilowatt hours per year .
This statistic shows net income in the textile industry in South Korea from 2010 to 2014 . In 2014 , the South Korean textile industry had a net income of about 509.7 billion South Korean won .

The statistic shows the percentage of U.S. adults that had a cat as of 2018 , by household income . According to the data , 32 percent of those living in households with an annual income of more than 100 thousand U.S. dollars owned a cat in 2018 .

In 2020 , the average cost per click for the keyword `` online marketing '' in Italy amounted to about 1.56 euros , marking a decrease of about 30 percent since 2018 . The cost per click for the keyword `` social media '' in the country was on average 0.93 euros that year .

This forecast statistic shows the revenue of data processing and preparation services in Canada from 2008 to 2012 , with forecasts up until 2020 . By 2016 , revenues of data processing and preparation services in Canada are projected to reach approximately 2.14 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic depicts the distribution of the U.S. adult population in 2019 , by the number of hours they spent listening to the radio per day . In the 12 months preceding the survey , around 22 percent of respondents aged 18 to 34 years said they spent more than one hour listening to the radio .
This statistic shows the average price paid for fresh apricots in Austria from 2011 to 2020 . In 2020 , the average price for a kilo of fresh apricots was about 4.23 euros .

This statistic displays the average number of nights per week that people in the United kingdom ( UK ) spent in a pub in 2014 , by region . In this year , it is found that 2.4 nights per week was the average number spent in the North East , while 5.6 nights per week was the average number spent in London .

This statistic presents the value of exports from the United Kingdom ( UK ) to Brazil from 1st quarter 2011 to 1st quarter 2018 . In the first quarter of 2018 , exports of services from the United Kingdom ( UK ) to Brazil amounted to approximately 39.5 million British pounds .

In the United States , 57 percent of respondents believed that the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak will cause the country 's economy to slow down significantly or to contract , while only eight percent of respondents thought that the outbreak will not have any effect . In contrast , only 14 percent of respondents thought that the outbreak will have a positive effect on the U.S. economy .

This survey shows the share of adults in the United States who say they have ever been on a diet as of 2012 , by diet type . According to the survey , 75 percent of respondents said they had been on a diet of some kind .

This statistic presents the most common reasons why consumers would stop visiting a company website in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014 . Of respondents , 42 percent would stop visiting a company website if they did not see any relevant products .

According to data from the survey , around 45 percent of respondents in Romania stated that they were very interested in buying a child care service in 2020 . A similar interest was also reported in Poland and Hungary . On the contrary , only one percent of respondents from Serbia were very interested in child care services .

This statistic shows the gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in the United States from 1990 to 2020 , with projections up until 2025 . In 2020 , the GDP in the United States amounted to 63,712.28 U.S. dollars per person .
